PrivacyPolicy.rapidmateCommitted: Rapidmate (we, us, our) is committed to protecting your data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, share, and protect your data and describes your rights under applicable laws, including the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
PrivacyPolicy.pleaseReviewPolicy: Please review this policy regularly, as it may be updated periodically.
PrivacyPolicy.rapidmateProvides: Rapidmate provides logistics services, connecting businesses with delivery professionals to ensure fast and reliable deliveries across France. Rapidmate operates under its parent company, AJS GROUP, which is responsible for issuing all invoices and bills related to our services. For questions or concerns about your data, contact us at:
PrivacyPolicy.dataCollectedDescription: IP address, browser type, cookies, and information provided via contact forms (name, email, phone number).
PrivacyPolicy.purposeDescription: Website functionality, responding to inquiries, analytics, and marketing.
PrivacyPolicy.lawfulBasisDescription: Consent (for cookies) and legitimate interests (analytics and communication).
PrivacyPolicy.personalIdentifiers: Personal identifiers (name, email, phone number, address).
PrivacyPolicy.paymentDetails: Payment details (processed securely via third-party providers).
PrivacyPolicy.deliveryInformation: Delivery information (pickup and drop-off addresses, item descriptions).
PrivacyPolicy.serviceDelivery: Service delivery, billing, customer support, and dispute resolution.
PrivacyPolicy.personalIdentifiersCouriers: Personal identifiers (name, email, phone number, vehicle details).
PrivacyPolicy.identityVerification: Identity verification, assignment of delivery tasks, payment processing, and safety and Verification of delivery professional identity through photo capture, ensuring the authenticity and security of the individual handling the delivery.
PrivacyPolicy.contractualNecessitylegal: Contractual necessity, legal obligations, and legitimate interests.
PrivacyPolicy.cookiesTrackingTechnologiesDes: We use cookies to enhance your experience on our website. Cookies are small text files that help us remember your preferences, improve functionality, and provide analytics about website usage.
PrivacyPolicy.cookiesForMoreDetails: For more details about how we use cookies and how you can control them, please refer to our Terms & Conditions.
PrivacyPolicy.consentCookiesDescription: We rely on your consent to use non-essential cookies. You have the right to withdraw or modify your consent at any time through your browser settings or the cookie preferences provided.
PrivacyPolicy.consentCookiescontinuing: By continuing to use our website, you consent to the use of non-essential cookies unless you opt-out using the options provided.
PrivacyPolicy.enhanceUserExperience: We use cookies to enhance user experience, provide analytics, and ensure website functionality. Cookies are categorized into essential and non-essential types. Essential cookies are necessary for the basic operation of our platform, while non-essential cookies are used for analytics and marketing purposes.
PrivacyPolicy.manageYourCookie: You can manage your cookie preferences via our dedicated cookie settings page or by adjusting your browser settings. For non-essential cookies, we rely on user consent, which can be withdrawn or modified at any time.
PrivacyPolicy.yourPersonalData: We use your personal data for the following purposes:
PrivacyPolicy.serviceProvisionProcessOrders: To process orders, assign deliveries, and ensure timely logistics operations.
PrivacyPolicy.customerSupportDes: To address inquiries, complaints, and disputes.
PrivacyPolicy.promotionalMaterials: To send promotional materials (with your consent).
PrivacyPolicy.analyticsDescription: To improve our services through usage data analysis.
PrivacyPolicy.weMayShare: We may share your data with
PrivacyPolicy.serviceProvidersDesc: For hosting, payment processing, and customer communication. These providers include [Service Providers' Names], who ensure GDPR compliance and data protection.
PrivacyPolicy.couriersDescription: Limited data (e.g., delivery addresses) necessary for completing deliveries.
PrivacyPolicy.legalAuthoritiesDescription: As required by law, including for tax and regulatory compliance.
PrivacyPolicy.rapidmateNoDataSell: Rapidmate does not sell your personal data to third parties.
PrivacyPolicy.internationalDataTransfersDes: If your data is transferred outside the European Economic Area (EEA), we ensure compliance with GDPR through appropriate safeguards, such as standard contractual clauses or equivalent measures. For example, we use [Service Provider Names] for hosting/payment processing, which adhere to GDPR-compliant data protection practices.
PrivacyPolicy.dataRetentionDescription: We retain personal data for the following periods, which are aligned with our operational and legal needs:
PrivacyPolicy.customerDataDescription: Retained up to 3 years after your last activity on the platform. This ensures we have a complete record of our transactions for customer support and legal compliance.
PrivacyPolicy.courierDataDescription: Conservées jusqu’à 5 ans après la désactivation du compte, conformément aux exigences légales liées au travail et aux réglementations de transport.
PrivacyPolicy.paymentRecordsDescription: Retained for 10 years to comply with tax and financial regulations.
PrivacyPolicy.cookiesAndAnalyticsDescription: Data is retained for up to 1 year for tracking and improving our website and services.
PrivacyPolicy.securityMeasuresDescription: We employ robust technical and organizational measures to protect your data, including:
PrivacyPolicy.regularResponseProcedures: Regular audits and breach response procedures.
PrivacyPolicy.underGDPR: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:
PrivacyPolicy.accessDescription: Request a copy of the personal data we hold about you.
PrivacyPolicy.erasureDescription: Request deletion of your data, subject to legal and contractual obligations.
PrivacyPolicy.restrictionDescription: Limit processing of your data under specific circumstances.
PrivacyPolicy.portabilityDescription: Transfer your data to another service provider.
PrivacyPolicy.objectionDescription: Object to data processing based on legitimate interests.
PrivacyPolicy.exerciseRightsContact: To exercise your rights, contact us at:
PrivacyPolicy.accountDeletionDescription: You may request the deletion of your account at any time by contacting us through contact@rapidmate.fr or using the support feature available on the platform. Upon receiving your request, we will process the deletion of your account in accordance with our policies.
PrivacyPolicy.accountDeletionAfter: Once your account is deleted, you will no longer have access to any of the services associated with your account. Please be aware that account deletion is permanent and irreversible. After deletion, you will lose access to any data, records, or content associated with your account, except where we are required by law to retain certain information.
PrivacyPolicy.certainInformation: We may retain certain information for legitimate business or legal reasons, such as transaction history or records required for compliance with applicable laws and regulations.
PrivacyPolicy.questionsDeletionProcess: If you have any questions about the account deletion process, please contact us at contact@rapidmate.fr.
PrivacyPolicy.complaintsDescription: If you believe your data rights have been violated, we encourage you to first reach out to Rapidmate directly to address and resolve the issue. You can contact us via email at contact@rapidmate.fr
PrivacyPolicy.satisfactionComplaint: If your concerns are not resolved to your satisfaction, you have the right to file a complaint with:
PrivacyPolicy.commissionNationale: Commission Nationale de l'Informatique et des Libertés (CNIL) via
PrivacyPolicy.automatedDecisionMakingDescription: We do not use your data for automated decision-making or profiling. However, we may use data for logistical purposes, such as assigning deliveries to the appropriate couriers, which is not considered automated decision-making under GDPR.
PrivacyPolicy.childrenPrivacyDescription: Our services are not directed towards individuals under the age of 16. We do not knowingly collect or process personal data from children. If we become aware that we have inadvertently collected personal data from a child without appropriate consent, we will take steps to delete such information promptly.
PrivacyPolicy.updatesThisPolicyDescription: This Privacy Policy may be updated periodically. The latest version will always be available on our website, and any significant changes will be communicated to you via email or through notifications.
PrivacyPolicy.contactInformationDescription: For any questions about this Privacy Policy, contact us at:

TermsConditions.rapidmateIntroDesc: Rapidmate is a division/brand of AJS Group, a company registered in Pontoise registry, with company registration number SIRET: 92270101600011. All services provided by Rapidmate are under the legal and financial responsibility of AJS Group. Rapidmate provides a technology platform connecting businesses and individuals (referred to as Users) with freelance delivery professionals (Couriers) to offer scalable, reliable, and eco-friendly logistics services across France.
TermsConditions.userDescription: Any individual or entity that books delivery services through the Rapidmate platform.
TermsConditions.courierDescription: A freelance professional registered on the platform to fulfil delivery requests.
TermsConditions.platformDescription: The technology systems, including the website and app, through which services are accessed.
TermsConditions.serviceDescription: Refers to all logistics, delivery, and cleaning solutions provided by Rapidmate, including but not limited to transportation, delivery from businesses to end customers, package handling, route optimization, multi-tasking personnel, cleaning services, and any other related services offered by Rapidmate.
TermsConditions.goodsDescription: Items being transported, excluding prohibited items outlined in Section 7.
TermsConditions.feeDescription: Refers to the amount payable for the services provided by Rapidmate. Currently, no additional fees are charged for delivery services, waiting, or cancellations. Any future changes or additional fees will be communicated to clients in advance.
TermsConditions.forceMajeureDescription: Events beyond reasonable control, including natural disasters, strikes, or government actions.
TermsConditions.acceptanceOfTermsDescription: By accessing or using the Rapidmate Platform, Users and Couriers agree to these Terms & Conditions. Non-compliance may lead to account suspension or termination.
TermsConditions.geographicalScopeDescription: Rapidmate operates exclusively within France, covering all regions for delivery services.
TermsConditions.deliveryTypesDescription: Rapidmate facilitates on-demand deliveries, scheduled deliveries, and multi-address drops for B2B and B2C services.
TermsConditions.bookingDescription: Users can request services via the app or website by providing accurate pickup and delivery information.
TermsConditions.opportunitiesDescription: The platform offers Couriers flexible opportunities to accept and fulfill delivery requests.
TermsConditions.paymentDescription: Couriers earn income per completed delivery, with bonuses for high performance or sustainability contributions (e.g., electric vehicle use).
TermsConditions.platformFacilitationDescription: Rapidmate acts as an intermediary, facilitating connections between Users and Couriers. Rapidmate does not directly provide delivery services or act as an employer of Couriers.
TermsConditions.accurateInformationDescription: Users must provide correct and complete details for pickup and delivery addresses.
TermsConditions.securelyPackaged: Goods must be securely packaged to withstand standard delivery handling.
TermsConditions.securelyProhibited: Prohibited items (Section 7) must not be included in deliveries.
TermsConditions.applicableFees: Users agree to pay all applicable fees, including waiting charges and late cancellation penalties, as outlined in the pricing structure.
TermsConditions.complianceWithLawsDescription: Users must ensure that all Goods comply with applicable French laws, including restrictions on hazardous or illegal items.
TermsConditions.validIdentification: Couriers must be at least 18 years old, possess valid identification, and, where applicable, a valid driver’s license.
TermsConditions.couriersUsingVehicles: Couriers using vehicles must ensure they are roadworthy, insured, and meet all legal standards.
TermsConditions.couriersProfessionally: Couriers are required to act professionally, comply with traffic laws, and handle Goods with care.
TermsConditions.misconductIncluding: Misconduct, including delayed or incomplete deliveries, may result in account suspension.
TermsConditions.equipmentDescription: Couriers must use appropriate equipment (e.g., insulated bags for perishable items) as specified for certain delivery types.
TermsConditions.performanceStandardsDescription: Couriers are expected to maintain high service standards, including on-time deliveries and adherence to User instructions.
TermsConditions.serviceFeesCalculated: Service fees are calculated based on delivery type, distance, and additional requirements (e.g., waiting time, multi-address drops).
TermsConditions.serviceFeesConfirmation: Fees are displayed upfront before confirmation.
TermsConditions.paymentsServicesRendered: Payments for services rendered are processed through the Rapidmate Platform. Couriers are typically paid on a weekly basis for completed deliveries. However, in specific cases, exceptions may apply:
TermsConditions.shiftBasedPaymentsDescription: Couriers booked on a shift basis may have the option to receive payments weekly or monthly, based on the terms agreed upon during booking.
TermsConditions.adminApprovedExceptionsDescription: Rapidmate reserves the right to offer flexibility in payment schedules, subject to approval by the administrative team.
TermsConditions.couriersAreProhibited: users must pay via the app or website; direct payments to Couriers are prohibited.
TermsConditions.maintainsAllRecords: Rapidmate maintains all records related to completed deliveries and shifts to ensure accurate payment calculations. Any disputes related to payments must be raised by Couriers within 7 days of receiving the payment.
TermsConditions.courierIsDispatched: Users can cancel orders free of charge if done before a Courier is dispatched.
TermsConditions.cancellationsCourier: Late cancellations may incur fees to compensate the assigned Courier.
TermsConditions.userLiabilityDescription: Users are liable for ensuring the legality and safety of Goods transported.
TermsConditions.courierLiabilityDescription: Couriers are liable for damages resulting from negligence or intentional misconduct.
TermsConditions.rapidmateMisinformation: Rapidmate is not liable for delays, losses, or damages caused by User-provided misinformation, traffic disruptions, or Force Majeure.
TermsConditions.submittedWithin: Claims must be submitted within 48 hours of delivery for review.
TermsConditions.prohibitedItemsDescription: The following items are strictly prohibited from being included in deliveries handled by Rapidmate. By using our services, you agree not to ship or request the transport of the items listed below:
TermsConditions.flammableExplosive: Flammable, explosive, or combustible substances, such as gasoline, lighter fluid, or fireworks.
TermsConditions.corrosiveRadioactive: Toxic, corrosive, or radioactive materials, including certain chemicals, batteries, or materials marked as hazardous under French law.
TermsConditions.ammunitionClassified: Weapons, ammunition, or any items classified as dangerous by relevant authorities.
TermsConditions.illegalItemsDescription: Any items that are illegal under French law or international regulations, including counterfeit goods, narcotics, or stolen property.
TermsConditions.violatingIntellectual: Goods violating intellectual property laws, such as pirated media or unlicensed merchandise.
TermsConditions.perishableTemperature: Perishable items require specific temperature control unless explicitly agreed upon in advance and packaged according to our guidelines.
TermsConditions.perishableTransit: Food, beverages, or other perishables that may spoil or pose health risks during transit.
TermsConditions.medicinesPharmaceutical: Medicines, medical devices, or pharmaceutical products unless proper documentation is provided and prior approval is obtained.
TermsConditions.alcoholCompliance: Alcohol or tobacco products without the required permits and compliance with local laws.
TermsConditions.requiringArtifacts: Items requiring special permits, such as cultural artifacts or wildlife products, unless approved in writing by Rapidmate.
TermsConditions.definitionScopeItems: Definition and Scope of High-Cost Items
TermsConditions.definitionScopeItemsDescription: For the purposes of this agreement, High-Cost Items are goods or products with significant monetary value, typically exceeding €2,500, or any item with intrinsic or sentimental value, such as:
TermsConditions.negotiableInstruments: Cash or negotiable instruments (e.g., checks, bonds)
TermsConditions.expensiveElectronics: Expensive electronics, designer items, or luxury goods
TermsConditions.customersBookingProcess: Customers must declare any High-Cost Items during the booking process.
TermsConditions.stronglyRecommends: Rapidmate strongly recommends that customers arrange adequate insurance for such items before delivery. Without insurance, the customer assumes full responsibility for any risk of damage, loss, or theft.
TermsConditions.damageHighCostItemsDescription: If the cost of the damaged item is high:
TermsConditions.highCostItemsDescription: Rapidmate will not be held liable for damage or loss of high-cost items, regardless of the circumstances. Customers are advised to insure such items through their chosen provider to safeguard against potential risks.
TermsConditions.lowerCostItems: If the cost of the damaged item is lower:
TermsConditions.lowerCostItemsDescription: Liability depends on the nature of the incident:
TermsConditions.deliveryPersonnel: Damage caused by the Rapidmate delivery personnel:
TermsConditions.mishandlingPersonnel: If damage occurs due to negligence or mishandling by Rapidmate’s delivery personnel, compensation will be handled through the delivery personnel's commercial insurance.
TermsConditions.externalAccidents: Damage caused by external accidents (e.g., other vehicles):
TermsConditions.externalAccidentsDescription: If damage results from a third-party accident, Rapidmate will assist in facilitating a claim process where applicable, but the customer acknowledges that Rapidmate holds no liability for such incidents.
TermsConditions.secureInsurance: Customers are required to secure insurance for high-cost items.
TermsConditions.rapidmateStrivesMaintain: Rapidmate strives to maintain a zero-liability stance for high-cost items. This ensures that the company is not financially or legally impacted by claims related to such items. To ensure this:
TermsConditions.rapidmateResponsible: Rapidmate will not be responsible for losses, damages, or theft involving high-cost items, irrespective of the cause.
TermsConditions.bookingWithRapidmate: By booking with Rapidmate, the customer agrees to:
TermsConditions.declareHighCostItems: Declare high-cost items at the time of booking.
TermsConditions.assumeFullResponsibility: Assume full responsibility for arranging insurance for any high-cost items.
TermsConditions.indemnifyRapidmateAgainst: Indemnify Rapidmate against any claims, losses, or damages resulting from the transportation of high-cost items.
TermsConditions.liveAnimalsPlants: Live animals or plants unless explicitly agreed upon with appropriate packaging and handling arrangements.
TermsConditions.biologicalSpecimens: Human remains, body parts, or biological specimens.
TermsConditions.emittingStrongOdors: Items emitting strong odors or substances that may damage other goods or equipment.
TermsConditions.refusalServiceDescription: Rapidmate reserves the right to refuse pickup or delivery of any shipment suspected of containing prohibited items.
TermsConditions.prohibitedItemsShipped: If prohibited items are shipped without disclosure, the client assumes all liability, including fines, penalties, or damages incurred.
TermsConditions.rapidmateMayReport: Rapidmate may report the shipment of illegal items to relevant authorities as required by law.
TermsConditions.complaintSubmissionDescription: Complaints must be sent to the rapidmate customer support via email or by courier within 7 days of the incident.
TermsConditions.resolutionProcessDescription: Rapidmate will acknowledge complaints within 48 hours and provide a resolution within 14 days.
TermsConditions.escalationDescription: Unresolved disputes may be referred to mediation or arbitration under French law.
TermsConditions.rapidmateCommittedPromoting: Rapidmate is committed to promoting eco-friendly practices and fostering sustainability in delivery operations. To encourage the adoption of environmentally conscious behaviors, we provide resources and education to both Users and Couriers on sustainable practices.
TermsConditions.rapidmateDoesNotCurrentlyOffer: While Rapidmate does not currently offer financial incentives for couriers using electric vehicles, we are exploring opportunities to support sustainable delivery methods in the future.
TermsConditions.usersAndCouriers: Users and Couriers must adhere to all applicable French laws regarding delivery, transportation, and data privacy.
TermsConditions.rapidmateReserves: Rapidmate reserves the right to update these Terms & Conditions with prior notice to Users and Couriers.
TermsConditions.governingLawDescription: These Terms & Conditions are governed by French law.
TermsConditions.accountDeletionDescription: You may request the deletion of your account at any time by contacting us through contact@rapidmate.fr or using the support feature available on the platform. Upon receiving your request, we will process the deletion of your account in accordance with our policies.
TermsConditions.onceYourAccountDeleted: Once your account is deleted, you will no longer have access to any of the services associated with your account. Please be aware that account deletion is permanent and irreversible. After deletion, you will lose access to any data, records, or content associated with your account, except where we are required by law to retain certain information.
TermsConditions.retainCertainInformation: We may retain certain information for legitimate business or legal reasons, such as transaction history or records required for compliance with applicable laws and regulations.
TermsConditions.questionsAboutAccountDeletion: If you have any questions about the account deletion process, please contact us at contact@rapidmate.fr
